activities: We are an email service provider that provides services to our clients that send electronic messages to EU and Switzerland.
eucountries: Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: organization name, client contact name, client contact address, client contact phone, client email, billing address, credit card number, invoices. Includes manually processed data.
recoursemech:
We provide a option for individuals to contact a third party for unresolved disputes via a link in our privacy policy that links to TRUSTe. 

For organization human resources data: EU data protection authorities (EU DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
